document_data.caption: A map showing Pontswain in southern Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Pontswain
document_data.mainbody: '''Pontswain''' was a small coastal town located on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Pontswain was located at the end of [[Corwell Road]] in the kingdom of [[Corwell]] in southern Gwynneth. The town sat along the southern coast of [[Corwell Firth]] near the edge of [[Kimball Moor]].
